snippet.title: Lloyd the Monkey 3: Judgement Day - Final Trailer
snippet.description:
It's been a long two years since work started on Lloyd the Monkey 3: Judgement Day, and a even longer seven years since the series started. As we finish up the last batch of work left to do on the story and polish, we're excited to announce that Lloyd the Monkey 3 will launch on Steam this coming JULY 31st. We hope the finale will be worth it to everybody who has been following us over the years.

-STORE LINKS-
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2615440/Lloyd_the_Monkey_3_Judgement_Day/
Itch.io - https://meyer-games.itch.io/lloyd-the-monkey-3
Gamejolt - https://gamejolt.com/games/lloyd-the-monkey-3/773361

-CREDITS-
Music ("It's our battle") by Alexandr Zhelanov, sourced from Opengameart.com
VFX by anoerone on vecteezy.com
All subscribers to Patreon.com/MeyerGames
